subject: Baseball
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Mejia, who was suspended in April for 80 games after testing positive for a performance-enhancing drug, did not apologize as he spoke before a 3-0 loss to the Giants.
snippet: Mejia, who was suspended in April for 80 games after testing positive for a performance-enhancing drug, did not apologize as he spoke before a 3-0 loss to the Giants.
